# sailpoint_transform (Resource)

Manages a SailPoint Transform. Transforms are used to manipulate attribute values during identity processing.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the transform. Cannot be changed after creation.
- `type` (String) The type of the transform (e.g., 'lower', 'upper', 'concat', 'substring'). Cannot be changed after creation.

### Optional

- `attributes` (String) A JSON object containing the transform-specific configuration attributes.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the transform. Generated by SailPoint.
